info.title: Liquipack Workflow - APIs
info.description:
APIs for Liquipack Workflow
[Download api document(.yaml)](/api-doc/download/yaml)
[Download api document(.json)](/api-doc/download/json)

username.description: username of the user (must be unique)

password_hash.description: MD5 hash of the user's password

app_permissions.description: Identifiers of apps the user has permissions to

quotation_num.description: quotation_num of the quotation (must be unique)

auto_level_tank.description: Auto tank leveling requirement and price
Auto tank leveling requirement and price
